1770
1337
Your will run on N files:
ls sh/  | grep OutPut | grep T50000 | grep -v T30000 | grep -v T10000 | sort | grep -c '_T50000_'
That contain N limits:
grep 'Limit: r <' sh/OutPut_*_T50000_* | grep -c txt
